two companies partnered in 2015, starting with Microservices development…and just a small team of 3 engineers.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"12.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"\\\"Sans was followed by Infrastructure Operations as well as Analytics Teams, our earliest programs. ​\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"12.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"\\\"Sans 2015-2016, Epic heavily invested its efforts into online gaming and online gaming services. EPAM was right behind these initiatives, building backend. \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"12.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"\\\"Sans Regular\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"+mn-ea\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"+mn-cs\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\",\"color\":\"#303240\",\"mso-font-kerning\":\"12.0pt\",\"language\":\"en-US\",\"font-weight\":\"normal\",\"font-style\":null,\"mso-style-textfill-type\":\"solid\",\"mso-style-textfill-fill-color\":\"#303240\",\"mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha\":\"100.0%\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After releasing Fortnite in 2017, Epic Games was looking for experienced Fortnite gamers to test out the new season and all its features before its release to millions of users worldwide. Through this testing phase, EPAM and Epic Games were able to detect bugs and fix any performance issues before the launch of the new season. \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"12.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"\\\"Sans Regular\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"+mn-ea\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"+mn-cs\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\",\"color\":\"#303240\",\"mso-font-kerning\":\"12.0pt\",\"language\":\"en-US\",\"font-weight\":\"normal\",\"font-style\":null,\"mso-style-textfill-type\":\"solid\",\"mso-style-textfill-fill-color\":\"#303240\",\"mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha\":\"100.0%\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"From 2018 to 2023, we’ve been constantly building gaming products. Together, the two partners shifted from a microservices architecture to a first-of-its-kind digital platform that supports the global gaming community, enables creators and developers to launch, operate and scale gaming experiences on any engine, store or platform.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"12.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"\\\"Sans there are over 8,575 Epic Employees - and 580+ of them are EPAMers.
